TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependency extends System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependency Inherits CacheDependency
public ref class SqlCacheDependency sealed : System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency

summary.span: 在儲存於 ASP.NET 應用程式之 物件中的項目，和特定 SQL Server 資料庫資料表或 SQL Server 2005 查詢結果之間建立關聯性。

span.span: Establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and either a specific SQL Server database table or the results of a SQL Server 2005 query.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有支援之版本的 SQL Server （Microsoft SQL Server 7.0、 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 和 SQL Server 2005）類別會監視特定的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表。On all supported versions of SQL Server (Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, and SQL Server 2005) the class monitors a specific SQL Server database table. 當資料表變更，與資料表相關聯的項目會自，並將新版本的項目加入。When the table changes, items associated with the table are removed from the , and a new version of the item is added to the . 類別也支援與整合類別時使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]資料庫。The class also supports integration with the class when using a [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] database. 查詢通知機制[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]偵測到使其失效的 SQL 查詢，並移除任何快取的項目相關聯的 SQL 查詢結果的資料變更。The query notification mechanism of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] detects changes to data that invalidate the results of an SQL query and removes any cached items associated with the SQL query from the . 您可以使用類別將項目新增至您的應用程式使用時所依存的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表，或 SQL 查詢[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]。You can use the class to add items to your application's that are dependent on either a SQL Server database table or on an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. 您也可以使用這個類別使用指示詞，使相依於 SQL Server 資料庫資料表的輸出快取的頁面或使用者控制項。You can also use this class with the directive to make an output-cached page or a user control dependent on a SQL Server database table. 最後，您可以使用page 指示詞，以讓輸出快取的頁面相依於 SQL 查詢的結果，當使用類別[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]。Finally, you can use the class with the page directive to make an output-cached page dependent on the results of an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. 查詢通知使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]不支援使用者控制項的指示詞。Query notification using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] is not supported on the directive for user controls. > [!NOTE] > 針對此類別才能正常運作時使用以資料表為基礎的通知，資料庫和任何您想要對相依性的資料表必須具有啟用通知。For this class to work correctly when using table-based notifications, the database and any tables that you want to make dependencies on must have notifications enabled. 您可以呼叫的方法，以啟用通知類別，或使用命令列工具。You can enable notifications by calling methods of the class or by using the command-line tool. 此外，應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中必須包含適當的組態設定。In addition, the proper configuration settings must be included in the application's Web.config file. > > 使用物件[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]查詢通知不需要任何明確的設定。Using a object with [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notification does not require any explicit configuration. 請參閱[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]線上叢書 》 的使用查詢通知時，不允許的 TRANSACT-SQL 查詢的類型限制的相關資訊。Consult the [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] Books Online for information about restrictions on the types of Transact-SQL queries that are allowed when using query notification. 下列範例顯示 ASP.NET Web.config 檔案，可讓資料表為基礎的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表的相依性。The following example shows an ASP.NET Web.config file that enables table-based dependencies on a SQL Server database table. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用和控制項以顯示 資料庫資料表。The following code example uses the and controls to display a database table. 頁面載入頁面時，嘗試建立物件。When the page is loaded, the page attempts to create a object. 在後建立物件、 頁面加入至項目`Cache`具有相依性物件。After the object is created, the page adds an item to the `Cache` with a dependency on the object. 您應該使用例外狀況處理類似於如下所示。You should use exception handling similar to that shown here. [!code-aspx-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用所提供的 建立快取索引鍵相依性，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立使用的查詢通知功能的物件[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]產品。This constructor is used to create objects that use the query-notification feature of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] products. 相關聯的 SQL 陳述式`sqlCmd`參數必須包含下列項目：SQL statements that are associated with the `sqlCmd` parameter must include the following: - 完整合格的資料表名稱，包括資料表擁有者的名稱。Fully qualified table names, including the name of the table owner. 例如，若要參考名為 Customers 資料庫擁有者所擁有的資料表，SQL 陳述式必須參考`dbo.customers`。For example, to refer to a table named Customers that is owned by the database owner, the SQL statement must refer to `dbo.customers`. - Select 陳述式中明確的資料行名稱。Explicit column names in the Select statement. 您無法使用星號 （\*） 萬用字元來選取資料表中的所有資料行。You cannot use the asterisk (\*) wildcard character to select all columns from a table. 比方說，而不是`select * from dbo.customers`，您必須使用`select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers`。For example, instead of `select * from dbo.customers`, you must use `select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers`. 這個建構函式不能用來建立關聯執行個體，其頁面上，使用的執行個體[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]查詢使用頁面層級輸出快取的通知。This constructor cannot be used to associate a instance with a instance on a page using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notifications with page-level output caching.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 執行個體的 屬性 (property) 設定為 ，且頁面上有一個指示詞的 屬性 (attribute) 設定為 CommandNotification。

span.span: The instance has its property set to and there is an directive on the page with the attribute set to CommandNotification.

summary.span: 使用所提供的參數建立快取索引鍵相依性，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied parameters to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立適用於 SQL Server 7.0 和 SQL Server 2000 產品的物件。This constructor is used to create objects for SQL Server 7.0 and SQL Server 2000 products. 資料庫名稱傳遞給`database`參數都必須定義應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。The database name passed to the `database` parameter must be defined in the application's Web.config file. 例如，下列 Web.config 檔案會定義一個名為針對 pubs 資料庫變更通知。For example, the following Web.config file defines a database named pubs for change notifications. ``` ``` 使用這個建構函式時通常擲回兩個例外狀況：和。Two exceptions are commonly thrown when this constructor is used: and . 如果會擲回，您可以呼叫例外狀況處理程式碼或使用命令列工具來設定通知的資料庫中的方法。If a is thrown, you can call the method in exception-handling code, or use the command-line tool to set up the database for notifications. 如果會擲回，您可以呼叫方法或用來設定通知資料表。If a is thrown, you can call the method or use to set up the table for notifications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個建構函式來建立的執行個體與 SQL Server 資料庫中名為 Categories 的資料庫資料表相關聯的類別名為 Northwind。The following code example uses this constructor to create an instance of the class that is associated with a database table named Categories in a SQL Server database named Northwind. [!code-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: The output-cache dependency directive.

summary.span: 在存放於 ASP.NET 應用程式之 物件中的項目與 SQL Server 資料庫資料表之間建立相依性關係。

span.span: Creates a dependency relationship between an item that is stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a SQL Server database table.
The new dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列標記會顯示一個典型的輸出快取相依性指示詞。The following markup shows a typical output-cache dependency directive. ``` <%@ OutputCache Duration="3600" SqlDependency="Northwind:Employees" VaryByParam="none" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DependencyDispose() cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetUniqueID() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetUniqueID () As String

summary.span: 擷取 物件的唯一識別項。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.

returns.span: 物件的唯一識別碼；如果無法產生識別碼，則為 Null。

span.span: The unique identifier for the object, or null if no identifier can be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回用來唯一追蹤的識別碼項目或應用程式相關聯的物件。The method returns an identifier used to uniquely track objects associated with an item or application. 當使用以資料表為基礎的通知時，產生的唯一識別碼是部分相依於資料庫所產生的變更識別項。The unique identifier generated when using table-based notifications is partially dependent on the change identifier generated by the database. 使用 SQL Server 2005 為基礎的查詢通知，唯一的識別碼時，`null`因為[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]不支援傳回個別的查詢通知的唯一識別碼。When using SQL Server 2005-based query notifications, the unique identifier is `null` because [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] does not support returning unique identifiers for individual query notifications .
